full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title and Reference Number**
-------------------------------------

* **English Title**: Custom Expanded Polystyrene Foam Inserts for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)
* **French Title**: Coussins en mousse de polystyrène expansée sur mesure pour Environnement et Changement climatique Canada (ECCC)
* **Reference Number**: WS4234237936-Doc4531042898

**Notice Information**
------------------------

* **Publication Date**: April 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 17, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing

**Tender Details**
------------------

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Burlington, Ontario

**Procuring Entity**
---------------------

* **Entity Name**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* **Entity Address**: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 4C6, Canada
* **Contact Name**: Scott, Jason (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Description**
--------------

Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Custom Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) foam inserts on an "as and when requested" basis. There are two streams applicable to this requirement: Stream 1 (Ontario Region) and Stream 2 (Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business - Ontario Region). The lowest priced offer for each stream will be issued a Standing Offer.

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 17, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on May 17, 2024, will result in non-responsiveness.

**Notice URL**
--------------

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19365965?extsite=MTkzNjU5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments**
-------------

None.
